step.datasource: SELECT TOP 100 percent c1.cmp_wwn, c1.cmp_code, c1.cmp_name, c2.TextField13 as IncoTermCode from [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy c1 with (NOLOCK) inner join [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.cicmpy c2 with (NOLOCK) on c1.cmp_code = c2.cmp_code where c1.cmp_type = 'S' and c1.cmp_status = 'A' and c2.cmp_type = 'S' and c2.cmp_status = 'A' and ISNULL(c2.TextField13,'') <> '' AND c2.TextField13 <> '-' and ISNULL(c2.TextField13,'') collate database_default <> ISNULL(c1.IncoTermCode,'') ORDER BY c1.cmp_code

SELECT TOP 100 percent c1.cmp_wwn, c1.cmp_code, c1.cmp_name, c2.TextField13 as IncoTermCode from [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy c1 with (NOLOCK) inner join [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.cicmpy c2 with (NOLOCK) on c1.cmp_code = c2.cmp_code where c1.cmp_type = 'S' and c1.cmp_status = 'A' and c2.cmp_type = 'S' and c2.cmp_status = 'A' and ISNULL(c2.TextField13,'') <> '' AND c2.TextField13 <> '-' and ISNULL(c2.TextField13,'') collate database_default <> ISNULL(c1.IncoTermCode,'') ORDER BY c1.cmp_code

SELECT TOP 100 percent c1.cmp_wwn, c1.cmp_code, c1.cmp_name, c2.TextField13 as IncoTermCode from [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy c1 with (NOLOCK) inner join [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.cicmpy c2 with (NOLOCK) on c1.cmp_code = c2.cmp_code where c1.cmp_type = 'S' and c1.cmp_status = 'A' and c2.cmp_type = 'S' and c2.cmp_status = 'A' and ISNULL(c2.TextField13,'') <> '' AND c2.TextField13 <> '-' and ISNULL(c2.TextField13,'') collate database_default <> ISNULL(c1.IncoTermCode,'') ORDER BY c1.cmp_code
